verses.roman:
tāra madhye prabhura siṁha-dvāre patana
asthi-sandhi-tyāga, anubhāvera udgama

synonyms: tāra madhye—in that chapter; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; siṁha-dvāre patana—falling down by the Siṁha-dvāra gate; asthi-sandhi—of the joints of the bones; tyāga—release; anubhāvera udgama—the awakening of a trance and emotion.
translation: Also in that chapter is a description of how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu fell down in front of the Siṁha-dvāra gate of Jagannātha temple, His bones separated at the joints, and how various transcendental symptoms awakened.
